text.0: glad thee thy glory hath been quaffed lord of bay steeds as twere the bowls enlivening mead.
text.1: for thee the strong there is strong drink mighty omnipotent to win.
text.2: let our strong drink most excellent exhilarating come to thee.
text.3: victorious indra bringing gain immortal conquering in fight.
text.4: thou hero winner of the spoil urgest to speed the car of man.
text.5: burn like a vessel with the flame the lawless dasyu conqueror.
text.6: empowered by thine own might o sage thou stolest sūryas chariot wheel.
text.7: thou barest kutsa with the steeds of wind to Śuṣṇa as his death.
text.8: most mighty is thy rapturous joy most splendid is thine active power.
text.9: wherewith foeslaying sending bliss thou art supreme in gaining steeds.
text.10: as thou o indra to the ancient singers wast ever joy as water to the thirsty.
text.11: so unto thee i sing this invocation may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
